cardList.name: Great Axe
cardList.description: A massive cutting blade, fixed to the end of a long, hardwood haft.

effect.content: Before the attack you may sidestep 1 square.

criticalSuccess.effect: You gain Mettle[4] and may immediately repeat the attack against an enemy within reach.

cardList.name: Boar Spear
cardList.description: A short-reach stabbing spear, fitted with a wide head and sturdy lugs to stop a charging foe.

effect.content: Before the attack you may run 1 square.

cardList.name: Battle Axe
cardList.description: A warrior's weapon, its heavy blade forged to deliver punishment.

criticalSuccess.effect: The target is Slowed[3] and you may immediately repeat the attack against an enemy within reach.

effect.content: Before the attack you may run 1 square.
Before the attack you may walk 1 square.

criticalSuccess.effect: The target is Weakened[3] and you may immediately repeat the attack against one enemy within reach.

effect.content: Before the attack you may sidestep 1 square.

criticalSuccess.effect: You gain Haste[4] and may immediately repeat the attack against one enemy within reach.

effect.content: Before the attack you may run 1 square.
